                           java.lang.String userCode)
                                       throws MalformedMacroException

        MalformedMacroException

      • integrateCode

        public static Algorithm integrateCode(java.lang.String algorithmName,
                      java.lang.String userCode)
                               throws CompilationException,
                                      MalformedMacroException,
                                      GalantException
        Integrates the given code into the program as a class with the given name.
        Parameters:
        algorithmName - the name of the algorithm to be integrated.
        userCode - the code of the algorithm to be integrated.
        Returns:
        an Algorithm object representing the algorithm.
        Throws:
        CompilationException - if compiler errors occur.
        MalformedMacroException - if there are errors in macro usage.
        GalantException

      • modifyAlgorithm

        public static java.lang.String modifyAlgorithm(java.lang.String head,
                               java.lang.String tail,
                               java.lang.String userCode)
                                        throws MalformedMacroException
        Modify Algorithm as needed
        Parameters:
        head - code block to be appended before the substantial algorithm part
        tail - code block to be appended after the substantial algorithm part
        userCode - user code containing algorithm{}
        Throws:
        MalformedMacroException
